Title: Daddy Daughter Day
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam F. Goldberg (creator), Adam F. Goldberg, Andrew Secunda, Stacey Harman (staff writer), Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: A day out with Erica leaves Murray wishing he hadn't asked about her life. Their annual school wardrobe shopping trip leaves Beverly and Adam at odds.
